title.narrative: Bangladesh Power System Enhancement and Efficiency Improvement Project

description.narrative: The proposed project will enhance the coverage and improve the reliability and efficiency of the transmission and distribution network, to facilitate better utilization of the expanding power generation capacity to meet the growth in electricity demand across the country

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
System average interruption duration index for BREB decreased by at least 20% (2015 baseline: 1,990 minutes based on planned interruptions for 11 kV feeders)

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved

title.narrative: System average interruption duration index for DESCO-operated part of Dhaka city decreased by at least 25% (2015 baseline: 646 minutes)

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved

title.narrative: About 950,000 new connections, including 875,000 rural households, connected to electricity network and benefiting at least 875,000 women (2016 baseline: 0)

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved

title.narrative: At least 65,000 tons of carbon emissions are avoided every year (2016 baseline: 0)

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved

title.narrative: Rural distribution losses reduced to 10% (2016 baseline: Losses at 12.5%)

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved
Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved

title.narrative: Tariffs annually reviewed and reset to increasingly cover costs of transmission and distribution utilities as per approved regulations (2016 baseline: Occasional tariff reviews are not based on approved regulations)

description.narrative: Access to efficient and reliable electricity supply in Bangladesh improved
